To determine whether use EMLA cream shorten recovery time . IV . To determine practitioner parent satisfaction use EMLA cream . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I : Patients receive topical EMLA cream 60 minute 4 hour prior LP follow standard sedation fentanyl citrate propofol .
